Feb. 17, 2026, 7:30 a.m. Thanks to the work of the Security Developer-in-Residence Seth Larson, the Python Security Response Team (PSRT) now has an approved public governance document (PEP 811). Following the new governance structure the PSRT now publishes a public list of members , has documented responsibilities for members and admins , and a … Read more Latest News More Join the Python Security Response Team!
